channel.title: [PI] Trading problem
channel.description: I've gotten the first trade interface to work and accept, but the second confirmation interface won't accept the trade. So basically, when i click the accept button on the second screen, it doesn't do anything.. any ideas on how to fix this problem?..

item.title: [PI] Trading problem
item.dc:creator: @iHype iHype
item.description:
@iHype wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:453786”]make sure the clients are correctly set,
if client one started the trade, that client 2 has the correct variables set ect… to be able to perform all actions[/quote]

Alrighty, thank you.

Read full topic

item.description:
